content.rendered:
Enter your information below
to get best deals from Graha Golf








    Graha Golf Surabaya

    The exclusive apartment Surabaya

    Apartment living is preferable by many due to the perks it offers. As Surabaya property is growing, so does the development of luxury apartment like Graha Golf Surabaya. But what makes it distinctive from other apartment Surabaya?

    Graha Golf is developed by Intiland with a purpose of providing harmonious life in Surabaya´s most desirable area. This apartment Surabaya is residential complex that includes a full service and amenities to cater your needs. The Surabaya property values your wellbeing as much as your loved ones. Bordered by incredible greeneries, it is one of the finest place in the city. Each unit redefined the idea of living peacefully and it is especially designed to complement today´s lifestyle.

    The golf course in Graha Famili has become an inspirational landmark to Surabaya citizens. The perfect greens and driving range – it is just a few steps away from this Surabaya property. This makes it ideal for those looking for lush greens – an unparalleled visual glory in the middle of skyscraper-packed city. It gives you the perception of outskirt living. Moreover, all apartments’ units in Graha Golf Surabaya have 270 degrees of golf view.

    Graha Golf Surabaya facilities and services

    Although Graha golf apartment is a luxury apartment, the design is surprisingly efficient and made to mesmerize. This apartment Surabaya is undoubtedly compelling as details have been meticulously considered. All facilities inside the complex are meant for your convenience and wellbeing. You can workout in the gym center or dip in the fresh water swimming pools. A safe and fun playground is dedicated to your children´s growth and a barbecue pit to gather your family and friends. Graha golf apartment is a few minutes away from city center. It´s a perfect place for those who wish to escape from the city´s busy activities for a relaxing retreat at home.

    Surabaya property: The premium housing you need in West Surabaya

    Out of its many features, the accessibility of this apartment Surabaya is second to none. Within minutes, you arrive at the biggest mall in the city, Pakuwon Mall. 30 minutes from Graha Golf Surabaya, you reach the business hub in downtown area like Panglima Sudirman district. The Satelit toll gate is just 10 minutes away. It definitely cuts down the time to commute and make a balanced life between work and relaxing.

    Arion-Alexa Tower

    Arion-Alexa tower is a spacious living with much airflow and natural light – resulting in an outdoor-like ambiance. This typical interior design has been used in various homes to help reduce the electricity bills.

    These are units that Graha Golf Surabaya offers:

    • Unit Pool Terrace Ground Floor 132 m2 (2 Bedrooms)

    In this unit, you will get 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 1 study room, 1 maid room, 1 area service, separate access to service area, kitchen, pantry, living room, dining room, and private access.

    • Unit Golf Garden Ground Floor 141 m2 (2 Bedrooms)

    In this unit, you will get 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 1 study room, 1 maid room, 1 area service, separate access to service area, kitchen, pantry, living room, dining room, and private access.

    Moreover, these tower are equipped with 24 hour concierge and two dedicated lifts for residents for a secured entry.

    Graha Golf Surabaya: The most desirable apartment in West Surabaya

    If you are looking for a strategic apartment Surabaya while still want to be connected to the nature, Graha Golf Surabaya can be the solution you can count on.
